column5: My friend said he was going to buy a new reel. His wife asked "How much do you think you will get for your old one?"

My (ex) wife once complained I had too much fishing gear and too many tools for just one guy.Â  Said I needed to make a choice. So I did. For twenty years we kept in touch by cheque. Not sure if it was cheaper but definitely quieter. And I still have too much fishing gear and too many tools for just one guy.  Michael
My wife has so many shoes and new outfits showing up on a regular basis she says nothing about my fishing gear. Having said that, I DO have it well hidden in the basement
